attributes.action: Ensuring the arts part of the EBacc
attributes.additional_details: The current proposal for the EBacc from Michael Gove does not include Arts based subjects; Drama, Music, Art, Dance, Photography, etcetera. This petition is designed to raise the profile of how these subjects should and must be included, to make sure talent is nurtured, creativity is cared for, confidence of young people is not crushed and students can continue to be inspired.
